item.title: Building a Debian 13 LXC Template for Proxmox
item.description:
Building a Debian 13 (Trixie) LXC Template for Proxmox

Debian 13 (trixie) was released, but (as of 2025-08-12) there isn’t a LXC template available for it on proxmox. I wanted to create a Debian 13 LXC container to run k3s in, so I made a template of my own.
